title: Redeemed
description: SERIES READING ORDER1 - Redeemed2 - Desperate3 - Clueless4 - Tempted5 - Relentless6 - ShamelessJed Baker was damned.The Navy SEAL had lost his team, his brothers-in-arms, his family and his home.Hell, he'd even lost his goddamn mind.He had survived hell on earth, and the taint of death and violence that filled his soul was toxic; the demons he carried within, a threat to everyone around him.In his darkest hour, he met a sweet, innocent woman who warmed his cold, barren heart and gave his tormented soul peace.She made him want to be the hero she thought he was.Her unconditional love gave the weary warrior something to fight for, and he'd walk through the fires of hell to keep her.He was redeemed.
author: Tonya Brooks
